name: Blob The Crown
description:
Help bob get all the shiny crown by transforming into a various of tool

Controls:

Arrow key:Move

Spacebar:Jump

R:Reset Level

E(When in blob mode):Transform into a tool blob touch

E(When in tool mode):Transfrom back to blob

Knife:Fast, jump high, but can stuck in plank

Hammer:Slow, heavy, but can break plank

Baloon:Much Light, little gravity wow ,but can get destroyed when it touch knife

Jackhammer:Move boulder by spamming jump on top of the boulder
